text: Joakim Jensen is a retired Norwegian professional ice hockey player who spent most of his career with Storhamar of the Norwegian GET-ligaen. Jensen scored the overtime game-winning goal against Sparta in the longest professional ice hockey game of all time, game 5 of the 2016â€“17 quarterfinals. ==Other websites== * Category:1987 births Category:Baie-Comeau Drakkar players Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Oslo Category:Norwegian ice hockey players
title: Joakim Jensen
